titles.title: A bill to amend the International Religious Freedom Act of 1998 to include the desecration of cemeteries among the many forms of violations of the right to religious freedom.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 6/11/2014--Introduced. Amends the International Religious Freedom Act of 1998 to include the desecration of cemeteries among the forms of violations of the right to religious freedom in many countries around the world.
